Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Corona Rodier Paris places you in the heart of Paris, walking distance from Paris Museum of Freemasonry and Folies Bergere. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 38 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as complimentary newspapers and refrigerators.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).



Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

A stay at Hotel Corona Rodier Paris places you in the heart of Paris, walking distance from Paris Museum of Freemasonry and Folies Bergere. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Paris Museum of Freemasonry - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Folies Bergere - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Theatre la Bruyere - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Passage Verdeau - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Hotel Drouot - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Gustave Moreau Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Le Palace Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Grevin Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of Romantic Life - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Opera Comique - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Galeries Lafayette - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Theatre Mogador - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Grand Rex Cinema - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Rue des Abbessees - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Montmartre Funicular - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 16.2 km / 10.1 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 21.8 km / 13.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Corona Rodier Paris is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
